statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT name, purchase_history FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 2 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT JSONB_VALUE(purchase_history, '$.product') AS product_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM customers GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 0 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, name FROM customers WHERE address = '123 Main St';
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = '123456789'
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE id = '987654321'
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT purchase_date, amount FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_id, name, amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 500;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY reg_date DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address='123 Main St';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT customers.name AS customer_name, products.product_name AS purchased_product FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT customers.name, products.product_name, product_reviews.rating FROM customers JOIN products ON customers.customer_id = products.product_id JOIN product_reviews ON products.product_id = product_reviews.product_id;

SELECT purchase_id, customers.name, products.product_name, total_amount FROM purchases JOIN customers ON purchases.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.purchase_id = products.product_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, address FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT c.name, a.street_address, a.city, a.state FROM customers c JOIN addresses a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE a.address_type = 'shipping';
